Package distances.sparse

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SparseCombinedMetric
    This class implements the functionality for combining different parts of the distances computed on sparse parts of the data representation.
    SparseCosineMetric
    This class implements the cosine distance on sparse representations.
    SparseManhattan
    This class implements the Manhattan distance for sparse representations.
    SparseManhattanWeighted
    This class implements the Manhattan distance for sparse representations, with additional feature weighting.
    SparseMetric
    This class defines sparse metrics via the distance method on their respective index to frequency maps.
    SparseMinkowskiMetric
    This class implements Minkowski distances for sparse representations
